titles.title: Local Control and Community Preservation Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require facilities generating electricity from wind or solar power to obtain local government approval as a condition of eligibility for certain tax credits.
Local Control and Community Preservation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Local Control and Community Preservation Act
This bill modifies the tax credit for the production of electricity from renewable resources and the energy tax credit to require the approval of local governments of wind and solar facilities qualifying for such credits.
